examples.title: Example 1
Example 2

adaptive.name: adaptive
adaptive.summary: >- Providing different rendering of the popup element based on the screen dimensions.

adaptiveFilter.name: adaptiveFilter
adaptiveFilter.summary: Sets the value of the adaptive filtering input of the ComboBox.

adaptiveSubtitle.name: adaptiveSubtitle
adaptiveSubtitle.summary:
"Specifies the text that is rendered as subtitle in the adaptive popup(action sheet).
Applicable only when 
`adaptive`
 is set to 
`true`
."

adaptiveTitle.name: adaptiveTitle
adaptiveTitle.summary:
"Specifies the text that is rendered as title in the adaptive popup(action sheet).
Applicable only when 
`adaptive`
 is set to 
`true`
.
If not provided, the title will be the same as the label."

allowCustom.name: allowCustom
allowCustom.summary: >- Specifies whether the ComboBox allows user-defined values that are not present in the dataset ([see example]({% slug custom_values_combobox %})). Defaults to `false` .

ariaDescribedBy.name: ariaDescribedBy
ariaDescribedBy.summary: "Identifies the element(s) which will describe the component, similar to [HTML aria-describedby attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/ARIA_Techniques/Using_the_aria-describedby_attribute).\r\nFor example these elements could contain error or hint message."

ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel
ariaLabel.summary: The accessible label of the component.

ariaLabelledBy.name: ariaLabelledBy
ariaLabelledBy.summary: Identifies the element(s) which will label the component.

className.name: className
className.summary: Sets additional classes to the ComboBox.

clearButton.name: clearButton
clearButton.summary: >- If `clearButton` is set to `true` , the ComboBox renders a button on hovering over the component. Clicking this button resets the value of the ComboBox to `undefined` and triggers the `change` event.

data.name: data
data.summary: >- Sets the data of the ComboBox ([more information and examples]({% slug binding_combobox %})).

dataItemKey.name: dataItemKey
dataItemKey.summary: |- Sets the key for comparing the data items of the ComboBox. If `dataItemKey` is not set, the ComboBox compares the items by reference ([see example]({% slug binding_combobox %}#toc-datasets-of-objects)).

defaultValue.name: defaultValue
defaultValue.summary: |- Sets the default value of the ComboBox. Similar to the native `select` HTML element.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.summary: Sets the disabled state of the ComboBox.

fillMode.name: fillMode
fillMode.summary:
"Configures the 
`fillMode`
 of the ComboBox.

The available options are:
- solid
- flat
- outline
- null—Does not set a fillMode 
`className`
."

filter.name: filter
filter.summary: >- Sets the value of ComboBox input. Useful for making the ComboBox input a [controlled

filterable.name: filterable
filterable.summary: >- Enables the filtering functionality of the ComboBox ([more information and examples]({% slug filtering_combobox %})).

focusedItemIndex.name: focusedItemIndex
focusedItemIndex.summary: "If set, the ComboBox will use it to get the focused item index.\r\n\r\nDefault functionality returns the first item which starts with the input text."

return.type: '(data: any, inputText: string, textField?: string) => number'

footer.name: footer
footer.summary: >- Sets the footer component of the ComboBox ([see example]({% slug customrendering_combobox %}#toc-headers-and-footers)).

groupField.name: groupField
groupField.summary: >- Sets the data item field that represents the start of a group. Applicable to objects data.

groupHeaderItemRender.name: groupHeaderItemRender
groupHeaderItemRender.summary: >- Fires when a ComboBox group header item is about to be rendered. Used to override the default appearance of the group's headers when the component is configured in `modern` group mode.

groupMode.name: groupMode
groupMode.summary: |- Defines the `classic` or `modern` type of the grouping's visualization. Defaults to `modern` .

groupStickyHeaderItemRender.name: groupStickyHeaderItemRender
groupStickyHeaderItemRender.summary: >- Fires when a ComboBox sticky group header item is about to be rendered. Used to override the default appearance of the sticky group header of the component.

header.name: header
header.summary: >- Sets the header component of the ComboBox ([see example]({% slug customrendering_combobox %}#toc-headers-and-footers)).

iconClassName.name: iconClassName
iconClassName.summary: |- Sets CSS classes to the expand `icon` DOM element.

id.name: id
id.summary: Specifies the id of the component.

inputAttributes.name: inputAttributes
inputAttributes.summary: "Sets the HTML attributes of the inner focusable input element.\r\nAttributes which are essential for certain component functionalities cannot be changed."

itemRender.name: itemRender
itemRender.summary: >- Fires when a ComboBox list item is about to be rendered ([see example]({% slug customrendering_combobox %}#toc-items)). Used to override the default appearance of the list items.

label.name: label
label.summary: Renders a floating label for the ComboBox.

listNoDataRender.name: listNoDataRender
listNoDataRender.summary: >- Fires when the element which indicates no data in the popup is about to be rendered. Used to override the default appearance of the element.

loading.name: loading
loading.summary: >- Sets the loading state of the ComboBox ([see example]({% slug filtering_combobox %}#toc-basic-configuration)).

name.name: name
name.summary:
"Specifies the 
`name`
 property of the 
`input`
 DOM element.

This property is part of the [FormComponentProps]({% slug api_common_formcomponentprops %}) interface."

onBlur.name: onBlur
onBlur.summary: Fires each time the ComboBox gets blurred.

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.summary: >- Fires each time the value of the ComboBox is about to change ([see examples]({% slug binding_combobox %})).

onClose.name: onClose
onClose.summary: Fires each time the popup of the ComboBox is about to close.

onFilterChange.name: onFilterChange
onFilterChange.summary: >- Fires each time the user types in the filter input ([see examples]({% slug filtering_combobox %}#toc-basic-configuration)). You can filter the source based on the passed filtration value.

onFocus.name: onFocus
onFocus.summary: Fires each time the user focuses the ComboBox.

onOpen.name: onOpen
onOpen.summary: Fires each time the popup of the ComboBox is about to open.

onPageChange.name: onPageChange
onPageChange.summary: >- Fires when both the virtual scrolling of the ComboBox is enabled and the component requires data for another page ([more information and examples]({% slug virtualization_combobox %})).

opened.name: opened
opened.summary: Sets the opened and closed state of the ComboBox.

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.summary: The hint that is displayed when the ComboBox is empty.

popupSettings.name: popupSettings
popupSettings.summary: Configures the popup of the ComboBox.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.summary: Sets a custom prefix to the ComboBox component.

required.name: required
required.summary:
"Specifies if 
`null`
 is a valid value for the component.

This property is part of the [FormComponentProps]({% slug api_common_formcomponentprops %}) interface."

rounded.name: rounded
rounded.summary:
"Configures the 
`roundness`
 of the ComboBox.

The available options are:
- small
- medium
- large
- full
- null—Does not set a rounded 
`className`
."

size.name: size
size.summary:
"Configures the 
`size`
 of the ComboBox.

The available options are:
- small
- medium
- large
- null—Does not set a size 
`className`
."

skipDisabledItems.name: skipDisabledItems
skipDisabledItems.summary: >- Defines if ComboBox's disabled items will be skipped or focused when navigating through the list of items using a keyboard. Defaults to `true` .

style.name: style
style.summary: The styles that are applied to the ComboBox.

suffix.name: suffix
suffix.summary: Sets a custom suffix to the ComboBox component.

suggest.name: suggest
suggest.summary: >- Enables the auto-completion of the text based on the first data item ([see example]({% slug suggestions_combobox %})).

textField.name: textField
textField.summary: >- Sets the data item field that represents the item text. If the data contains only primitive values, do not define it.

title.name: title
title.summary: Sets the title attribute to the underlying input element of the ComboBox.

valid.name: valid
valid.summary:
"Overrides the validity state of the component.
If 
`valid`
 is set, the 
`required`
 property will be ignored.

This property is part of the [FormComponentProps]({% slug api_common_formcomponentprops %}) interface."

validationMessage.name: validationMessage
validationMessage.summary: "Controls the form error message of the component. If set to an empty string, no error will be thrown.\r\n\r\nThis property is part of the [FormComponentProps]({% slug api_common_formcomponentprops %}) interface."

validityStyles.name: validityStyles
validityStyles.summary:
"If set to 
`false`
, no visual representation of the invalid state of the component will be applied.

This property is part of the [FormComponentProps]({% slug api_common_formcomponentprops %}) interface."

value.name: value
value.summary: >- Sets the value of the ComboBox ([more information and examples]({% slug binding_combobox %})).

valueRender.name: valueRender
valueRender.summary: >- Fires when the ComboBox input element is about to be rendered. Use it to override the default appearance of the component.

virtual.name: virtual
virtual.summary: >- Configures the virtual scrolling of the ComboBox ([more information and examples]({% slug virtualization_combobox %})).
